summary: A work in progress to convert all annoying (by my standards) NPCs to bears.
descriptionHtml:
This game-changing and revolutionary mod will completely cause you to rethink your entire existence...not really. It is just a mod that hopes to change all the annoying NPCs into bear models. This is obviously not a very lore-friendly or serious mod. Just a little something for the people that don't take their Skyrim playing too seriously. So far it's Nazeem, Braith, and Heaimskr. Hoping to include Solaf (He threatens to kill you even if you buy something) in the next update and I am in fact taking requests from the comment section.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Installation:
Just install using nexus, or drag and drop the esp of your choice into your Skyrim data folder.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Compatibility:
Doesn't add new scripts or anything. Just changes various NPCs to a bear. Should be compatible with every other mod.
___________________________________________________________________________________________
Change log:
1.6.9 - Original Nazeem bear uploaded
13.37 - Braith added to list of Bear converts
360.N0SC0P3 - Heimskr was converted into a bear by the the elves he hates so much
Upcoming - Solaf Bear!!!!!!!!!!
author: Froz3nLengend
